channel.title: Dedicated Server: Your map [maps/???.bsp] differs from the server's.
channel.description:
I run my dedicated server on Windows Server 2012 R2 x64. I can't join to my server because the server believes that I have a different version of the map dm_crossfire. Help me please.
[spoiler] Your map [maps/dm_crossfire.bsp] differs from the server's.
Host_Error: Client's map differs from server's [/spoiler]
start.bat: [spoiler][url='https://forums.blackmesasource.com/index.php/User/729-Echo/']@Echo[/url] off cls echo Protecting Black Mesa DM from crashes... title Black Mesa DM :s rcds echo (%time%) Black Mesa DM started. start /wait /high srcds -console -game bms -maxplayers 16 -port 27015 +sv_lan 0 +map dm_crossfire echo (%time%) WARNING: Black Mesa DM closed or crashed, restarting.... goto srcds[/spoiler]
server.cfg [spoiler]// Black Mesa server.cfg file hostname "[RU] Krasnoyarsk Black Mesa Deathmatch" mp_timelimit 900 mp_warmup_time 30 sv_lan 0 rcon_password "" mp_flashlight 1 mp_forcerespawn 0 mp_friendlyfire 0 mp_fraglimit 45 sv_logecho 1 v_logfile 1[/spoiler]

item.title: Dedicated Server: Your map [maps/???.bsp] differs from the server's.
item.dc:creator: D3lta
item.description:
I don’t know whether these are stock maps, or downloaded from the Steam-workshop, or manually installed onto the server so…
Did you manually install the maps onto your server?
Did you manually install the maps into your own folder?
Is your server running a newer or older version?
Do you play with the latest update?

Read full topic
item.source: Dedicated Server: Your map [maps/???.bsp] differs from the server's.

item.title: Dedicated Server: Your map [maps/???.bsp] differs from the server's.
item.dc:creator: Tolyak26
item.description:
This error only occurs with maps
dm_chopper
dm_crossfire
dm_rail

Why is this happening? Will there be fixed?

item.source: Dedicated Server: Your map [maps/???.bsp] differs from the server's.

item.title: Dedicated Server: Your map [maps/???.bsp] differs from the server's.
item.dc:creator: Tolyak26
item.description:
I run my dedicated server on Windows Server 2012 R2 x64. I can’t join to my server because the server believes that I have a different version of the map dm_crossfire. Help me please.

Your map [maps/dm_crossfire.bsp] differs from the server’s.

Host_Error: Client’s map differs from server’s

start.bat:

@Echo off
cls
echo Protecting Black Mesa DM from crashes…
title Black Mesa DM
:s rcds
echo (%time%) Black Mesa DM started.
start /wait /high srcds -console -game bms -maxplayers 16 -port 27015 +sv_lan 0 +map dm_crossfire
echo (%time%) WARNING: Black Mesa DM closed or crashed, restarting…
goto srcds

server.cfg

// Black Mesa server.cfg file
hostname “[RU] Krasnoyarsk Black Mesa Deathmatch”
mp_timelimit 900
mp_warmup_time 30
sv_lan 0
rcon_password “”
mp_flashlight 1
mp_forcerespawn 0
mp_friendlyfire 0
mp_fraglimit 45
sv_logecho 1
v_logfile 1

Read full topic
item.source: Dedicated Server: Your map [maps/???.bsp] differs from the server's.
